results.question: Which of the following is NOT a quote from the 1942 film Casablanca?
results.correct_answer: "Frankly, my dear, I don't give a damn."
incorrect_answers: “Of all the gin joints, in all the towns, in all the world, she walks into mine…”

incorrect_answers: In the Heat of the Night

results.question: In which African country was the 2006 film 'Blood Diamond' mostly set in?

incorrect_answers: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
